section.name: Project Overview
section.p: This project is a concrete implementation of Mevenide Core for Eclipse. See the features list and the Help page to learn more about Mevenide for Eclipse.
Latest release can be downloaded here, also related sources can be found there.

Mevenide has been tested under WinXP, Eclipse 2.1.0 (build 200303272130) and Eclipse 3.0 M1 With JDK 1.4.1.
Please note that JDK 1.4+ is
required since Java 1.4 regex Engine is used.
